properties.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Washington Cascades
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 4:34AM PST until January 18 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW FOR THE WASHINGTON CASCADES THIS EVENING THROUGH
SATURDAY...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12
inches.

* WHERE...East Slopes of the Washington Cascades.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM PST SATURDAY
